summary: The Promoting Resilient Supply Chains Act of 2025 aims to strengthen the resilience of critical supply chains, particularly for emerging technologies, to enhance national security and economic stability. It directs the Department of Commerce to establish a working group to assess vulnerabilities, identify threats, and develop strategies to mitigate supply chain disruptions. The bill emphasizes domestic manufacturing, partnership with allies, and the protection of voluntarily shared supply chain information. It also mandates a Department of Commerce capability assessment and establishes a sunset clause.
